The '''Brimstone''' is a river in southern [[Dorne]]. It runs through the desert and empties into the [[Summer Sea]]. The castle of [[Hellholt]] is located on its banks.<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/dorne/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Dorne entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Brimstone appears to have its source directly in the desert of southern Dorne, which seems to be unlikely. The source of the river may originate in the [[Red Mountains]] further north.  Despite being the only major river in central Dorne it is of little comfort to those who must pass through the harsh desert:  the waters of the river are sulphurous.
